name: Gang Tycoon
description:
In Gang Tycoon you manage your own gang. You are recruited by a mysterious man, who is the leader of a very big gang. He offers you a job as a factory manager. Will you be able to fulfill his expectations and build up a working drug business? If so you will surely be rewared and climb up the ranks. Maybe you will lead your own gang one day. Will you succed or fail?

Play Gang Tycoon an Idle Tycoon Game and become rich by being illegal. 

Please not that this is only  a demo. Feel free to post your feedback in the comments section.
